hero.headline: Consolidating 12 Systems Into One Unified Platform
hero.subtitle: A global oilfield services leader needed to redesign their hydraulic fracturing data management platform. We delivered a complete redesign that consolidated 12 legacy systems into a single, intuitive interface.

challenge.heading: The Challenge
challenge.intro: A global oilfield services leader needed to redesign their hydraulic fracturing data management platform. The existing interface had grown organically over years, accumulating complexity. Engineers struggled with data visualization, workflow navigation, and task completion.

cards.title: Legacy Fragmentation
cards.description: 12 separate systems had evolved independently over decades. Each had its own interaction paradigm, data model, and user expectations.

cards.title: Complex Data Visualization
cards.description: Hydraulic fracturing generates massive datasets. Engineers needed to visualize, compare, and act on this data in real-time during high-stakes operations.

cards.title: High-Stakes Environment
cards.description: For software managing field operations, usability gaps meant efficiency gaps — and efficiency gaps meant costly delays.

approach.heading: Our Approach
approach.intro: We executed a three-phase engagement: complete redesign, development support, and capability building.

steps.title: Information Architecture
steps.description: Restructuring 12 systems' worth of functionality into a coherent navigation and workflow model.

steps.title: Data Visualization
steps.description: Designing complex data visualizations for fracturing metrics that enable rapid decision-making.

steps.title: Development Support
steps.description: Design QA during implementation, iteration based on developer and user feedback, production asset delivery.

steps.title: Capability Building
steps.description: Training internal teams on UX methodology. Establishing design standards for future development.

work.heading: The Work
work.intro: Three phases took the platform from fragmented legacy systems to a unified, modern interface with internal UX capability.

cards.title: Complete Redesign
cards.description: Information architecture restructuring, complex data visualization for fracturing metrics, workflow optimization for field engineers.

cards.title: Design System
cards.description: Comprehensive component library ensuring visual consistency across the entire consolidated platform.

cards.title: Development QA
cards.description: Design quality assurance during implementation. Iteration based on developer and user feedback.

cards.title: Team Training
cards.description: Training internal teams on UX methodology. Establishing design standards for autonomous future development.

results.heading: Results
results.intro: The redesign delivered measurable improvements across all three phases of the engagement.

metrics.label: Systems Consolidated
metrics.description: Twelve legacy systems unified into a single coherent platform.

metrics.label: Efficiency Gain
metrics.description: Field engineers work 35% more efficiently with the consolidated interface.

metrics.label: Decision-Making
metrics.description: Consolidated data views enable faster decisions during operations.

metrics.label: UX Capability Built
metrics.description: Teams trained on UX methodology for ongoing autonomous improvement.

testimonial.quote: The new interface just makes sense. I can find what I need without thinking about it.
testimonial.author: Field Engineer
